There is a problem with the cantera installation with last sundials release=
 
2.2.0 which includes cvodes version 2.4.0
First the names and the locatio=
ns of some include files have been changed. But 
even after I fixed it I re=

Af=
ter reinstallation sundials to previous release 2.1.1 all is working!
I was=
 able even to install matlab toolbox using recommendation of Ricky:
cd $MAT=
LAB
cd sys/os/glnx86
mkdir old
mv libstdc++.* libg2c.* libgcc_s* old
